## Welcome to Simple Site

This is a test site for **FloatPrompt**. It demonstrates how FloatPrompt extracts content from HTML pages and converts them to clean markdown.

## Features

-   Clean extraction using Readability
-   Markdown conversion with Turndown
-   Automatic llms.txt generation
-   Human dashboard at /float/

## Get Started

Run the following command:

```
npx floatprompt generate ./dist
```

That's it! Your site is now AI-readable.
